settings.title: We have super powers.
settings.description: We have crafted the only superfood raw organic supplements low in fats, carbs, and sugars - yet high in protein and fiber.

settings.title: Carefully crafted and selected by top chef Rocco DiSpirito.

settings.heading: Sign up to get 10% off your first order!
settings.newsletter--subheading: You'll learn about the latest and greatest ROCCO products and get a special first order discount. It's a win-win!

settings.text: 10% off your first order with email sign-up | Free U.S. Shipping on All Orders

settings.title: Follow ROCCO
settings.description: Follow us on instagram for daily news, recipes, store updates and #foodspiration
